Posts.Content: hi everyone I was told on 1st for june I had breast cancer. I have had two op and have went will. but have just found out that I have the brca 2 gen. I was with my breast surgeon today. and she talked about breast risking surgery. or just have the radio treatment and a tablet I am only 36. so has any one else has the breast risking surgery. are any recomentdions Â
